Hallo,
I would like to run the swingui from within my main method.
With 
junit.swingui.TestRunner.startTest(suite()); 
it works fine.

Is there a possibility to call the swingui instead and pass it a Test 
object returned by suite()?
Thanks a lot,
Thomas
subject: possible to pass a suite() to swingui?
